org.jdrupes.httpcodec.internal

Class ClientEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.internal.Engine<HttpResponse,HttpRequest>
      • org.jdrupes.httpcodec.internal.ClientEngine
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpClientEngine

    public abstract class ClientEngine
extends Engine<HttpResponse,HttpRequest>
    An engine that can be used as an HTTP client. It has an associated request encoder and a response decoder. This is the base class that has access to (and provides) the internal API.
    Author:
    Michael N. Lipp
